tests.fixtures.app

Class FixtureApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • fit.Fixture
      • fit.ActionFixture
        • tests.fixtures.app.FixtureApp
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FixtureAppAllTestsExecuted, FixtureAppChangeGeneralConfiguration, FixtureAppConfigurationLoad, FixtureAppConfigurationSave, FixtureAppConfigurationValidate, FixtureAppCreateHtmlOut, FixtureAppElementsCreated, FixtureAppGeneralConfigurationClasspaths, FixtureAppGeneralConfigurationJavascript, FixtureAppGeneralConfigurationProperties, FixtureAppGeneralConfigurationStylesheet, FixtureAppLibraryConfiguration, FixtureAppReadHtmlOut, FixtureAppRunTests, FixtureAppTestConfiguration, FixtureAppTestRunnerConfiguration, FixtureAppTestRunnerConfigurationClasspathPopup, FixtureAppTestRunnerConfigurationLibraryPopup, FixtureAppTestSuiteConfiguration, FixtureAppTree

    public class FixtureApp
extends ActionFixture
    Implements the fixtures for testing the app. In Version 0.3 the structure has been revised.
    Version:
    0.3
    Author:
    Ren√© Majewski
